name: HoneybadgerWithReactOnRails
description: An example Rails/ReactOnRails application with client-side error reporting, server-side error reporting, and source maps.

HONEYBADGER_ASSETS_URL.description: 'assetsUrl' parameter for Honeybader Webpack Source Map plugin, change to match your environment by changing YOUR-HEROKU-SLUG-NAME

HONEYBADGER_REVISION.description: the current git commit SHA that corresponds to the 'revision' parameter in the honeybadger-js configuration
